title: Site Pages
description: Manage your website's static pages such as About Us, Terms of Service, Privacy Policy, etc.

actions.confirm_delete: Are you sure you want to delete this page?

fields.key_description: Unique identifier for the page (e.g., about, terms, privacy)
fields.slug_description: The URL path for this page (e.g., about-us, terms-of-service)
fields.title: Title

fields.content_description: The main content of the page
fields.meta_title_description: Title used for SEO (if different from page title)
fields.meta_description_description: Brief description of the page for search engines
fields.is_active_description: Whether this page is currently active
fields.is_public_description: Whether this page is accessible without login
